DOC.brief_summary: A randomized controlled trial was conducted to assess the effectiveness of text reminders sent to ACT users through an automated text messaging system short-message-system. Study hypothesis: text message reminders increase adherence
DOC.brief_title: Preserving ACTs - Text Reminders to Increase Adherence to ACT Treatment
DOC.detailed_description: A randomized controlled trial was conducted to assess the effectiveness of text reminders sent to ACT users through an automated text messaging system short-message-system. Patients were enrolled at clinics and pharmacies upon receipt of ACTs and enrolled in the automated system for 3 days.
DOC.criteria: subjects acquiring ACTs in Tamale, Ghana subjects acquiring ACTs for non household members subjects under the age of 18 subjects without access to cell phones subjects living more than 30 minutes from pickup location
